title: Cooper beats Conner in Saturday HS Rivals game
text:
Cooper beats Conner in Saturday HS Rivals game 
Updated: Mon, Oct 26 2015, 04:24 PM 
CINCINNATI (WKRC) -- Watch highlights of Cooper's thrilling victory over Conner in Kroger Saturday High School Rivals presented by Kelsey Chevrolet. Related Stories Business News 
US new home sales fall sharply in September 
WASHINGTON (AP) -- Sales of new homes plunged sharply in September to the slowest pace in 10 months, as higher prices and slower overall economic growth weigh on the housing market. 
IN THE NEWS: ESPN PULLING CLIPS FROM YOUTUBE 
LOS ANGELES (AP) -- ESPN says it won't play ball with YouTube. Stay Connected:
